amendment.description: Amendment increases the appropriation for the weatherization assistance program by $3.5 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment printed in the Congressional Record as of July 12, as amendment No. 64, that increases the appropriation for energy conservation programs by $3.5 million.

action.text: Skaggs amendment (A026) modified by unanimous consent.
On agreeing to the Skaggs amendment (A026) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.
